body:
Congratulations!
http://avicus.net/stats?time=overall

First to be lvl 100 overall
~many more to come

replies.body:
Red alert, red alert! Someone's telling Sunrise how to live his life again! Wait, no one cares this time? Okay... but in all seriousness I'm just kidding.

Yeah, congratulations and everything. I know leveling up becomes exponentially harder as you go further along, but I wasn't expecting it to take that much experience points... though, you're still spending an unhealthy amount of time playing. Not trying to start (ANOTHER) flame war, but I recommend (keyword) that you think more about managing your time, in case you already aren't and are actually a multitasking god...
